definition[0]: if a drum or something else beats out a rhythm, or if you beat out a rhythm on a drum, it makes a continuous regular sound
definition[1]: to defeat someone in a competition
example[0]: Lockheed beat out a rival company to win the contract.
example[1]: Roberts beat out Tony Gwynn for the Most Valuable Player Award.
definition[2]: to put out a fire by hitting it many times with something such as a cloth
